comment.body:
> Hi. Cannot reproduce. What causes an issue - one of enabled filters?

Hi, sorry for the late reply but I didn't know there was a reply. But thanks to your question, I have figured out that it was the Adguard French filter that is causing this issue. Disabling just that filter and the bug doesn't occur anymore.
Thanks

### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contains sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);

- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard DNS

### AdGuard version

Not Applicable

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Website or app doesn't work properly

### Which browser(s) do you use?

the problem is with app, not a site

### Which device do you use?

Mobile

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.mxtech.videoplayer.ad

AdGuard Mobile Ads filter

_No response_

comment.body:
Not reproduced it on my end.
Try to clear browser data, turn ABPVN List on, update the filters (wait almost one minute there), open the site.
If that doesn't work, you should re-enable the content blockers in Safari settings (wait about the same time as when you update the filters).

This domain is also used to serve image assets for MX Player's OTT platform (i.e., Online Streaming Service). It's broken now.
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/80810457/227437918-e50450e6-6b9a-48ee-8224-de55a47f0028.png)

comment.body:
As mentioned above, please enable `Greek AdBlock Filter` and update filters.
By the way, as I recall, `HTTPS filtering` doesn't work in Opera (it's required to hide ad leftovers/placeholders), so even after enabling `Greek AdBlock Filter` these placeholders might be not hidden in Opera, but should be hidden in Chrome.

issue.body:
### Please answer the following questions for yourself before submitting an issue.

- [ ] I am running the latest version
- [ ] I checked the documentation and found no answer
- [ ] I checked to make sure that this issue has not already been filed

### AdGuard version

Adguard 4.0 Nightly 71

### Environment

```markdown
- OS:Android 13
- Device: Samsung
- Firmware:
```


### Root access

- [ ] Yes, I have it.

### What filters do you have enabled?

AdGuard Base filter, AdGuard Mobile Ads filter, AdGuard Chinese filter, AdGuard Russian filter, AdGuard Tracking Protection filter, AdGuard URL Tracking filter, AdGuard Social Media filter, AdGuard Cookie Notices filter, AdGuard Popups filter, AdGuard Mobile App Banners filter, AdGuard Other Annoyances filter, EasyPrivacy, Fanboy's Annoyances, Fanboy's Social Blocking List, Peter Lowe's Blocklist, Online Malicious URL Blocklist, Fanboy's Enhanced Tracking List, I don't care about cookies, EasyList Cookie List, NoCoin Filter List, Dandelion Sprout's Annoyances List, Legitimate URL Shortener

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

Hide your search queries, Send Do-Not-Track signals, Strip URLs of tracking parameters, Self-destruction of third-party cookies, Disable WebRTC, Block Push API, Block Location API, Hide your Referrer from third-parties, Hide your User Agent, Hide your IP address, Remove X-client-Data header from HTTP request, Protect from DPI

### Issue Details

Steps to reproduce:
1.open Samsung internet browser or Chrome browser on phone
2. Go to bloomberg.com
3.shows black screen


### Expected Behavior

_No response_

### Actual Behavior

Blank screen

<details><summary>Screenshot 1:</summary>

<!-- paste screenshot here -->

</details>


### Additional Information

![Screenshot_20230322_175958_Samsung Internet](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/96619913/227059212-8d2cf78c-417c-4ee1-b3c3-783aec93471f.jpg)

issue.title: Incorrect rule for xhamster.com

labels.name: NSFW
labels.description: Nudes and porn sites

labels.name: A: In progress
labels.description: Work on the issue is in progress

issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

Other ad blocker

### AdGuard version

*

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Website or app doesn't work properly

### Which browser(s) do you use?

other (specify in comment below)

### Which device do you use?

Desktop

### Where is the problem encountered?

xhamster.com

### What filters do you have enabled?

---Third-party filters---

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

The rule xhamster.com#?#div[class]:has(> div[class*="widget"]) causes a problem on xhamster.com - the page turns completely blank.

They have body>.main-wrap>.bottom-widget-section in a video page (xhamster.com/videos/...)

The rule is in https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/MobileFilter/sections/css_extended.txt

### Privacy

- [X] I agree to follow this condition

comment.body:
Please test these two rules:

```
xhamster.com#@?#div[class]:has(> div[class*="widget"]) 
xhamster.com#?#div[class]:not(.main-wrap):has(> div[class*="widget"]) 
```

Не повторяется с вашими настройками.
Попробуйте выключить и снова включить контент-блокеры в настройках Сафари, а также обновить фильтры Адгарда.
Важно не закрывать окно Адгарда при обновлении фильтров в течение ~60 секунд, иначе iOS прервёт процесс применения фильтров.

issue.body:
### Please answer the following questions for yourself before submitting an issue.

- [ ] I am running the latest version
- [ ] I checked the documentation and found no answer
- [ ] I checked to make sure that this issue has not already been filed

### AdGuard version

Adguard 4.0 Nightly 71

### Environment

```markdown
- OS:Android 13
- Device: Samsung
- Firmware:
```


### Root access

- [ ] Yes, I have it.

### What filters do you have enabled?

AdGuard Base filter, AdGuard Mobile Ads filter, AdGuard Chinese filter, AdGuard Russian filter, AdGuard Tracking Protection filter, AdGuard URL Tracking filter, AdGuard Social Media filter, AdGuard Cookie Notices filter, AdGuard Popups filter, AdGuard Mobile App Banners filter, AdGuard Other Annoyances filter, EasyPrivacy, Fanboy's Annoyances, Fanboy's Social Blocking List, Peter Lowe's Blocklist, Online Malicious URL Blocklist, Fanboy's Enhanced Tracking List, I don't care about cookies, EasyList Cookie List, NoCoin Filter List, Dandelion Sprout's Annoyances List, Legitimate URL Shortener

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

Hide your search queries, Send Do-Not-Track signals, Strip URLs of tracking parameters, Self-destruction of third-party cookies, Disable WebRTC, Block Push API, Block Location API, Hide your Referrer from third-parties, Hide your User Agent, Hide your IP address, Remove X-client-Data header from HTTP request, Protect from DPI

### Issue Details

Steps to reproduce:
1.open Samsung internet browser or Chrome browser on phone
2. Go to bloomberg.com

_No response_

Blank screen

### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://www.dailymail.co.uk/tvshowbiz/article-11898073/Im-not-great-extrovert-Johnny-Depp-reveals-prefers-quiet-life-Somerset.html](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.dailymail.co.uk%2Ftvshowbiz%2Farticle-11898073%2FIm-not-great-extrovert-Johnny-Depp-reveals-prefers-quiet-life-Somerset.html) ### Comment > With Adguard enabled, the comments section of an article can no longer be displayed. Nothing happens when you click on the comments. > With Adguard deactivated, the comment function can be clicked and it opens normally below the article. ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://reports-img.adguard.com/CMFZbdy.jpg)
